@page "/buttons/keyboard-navigation"

@using Syncfusion.Blazor.SplitButtons


@using Syncfusion.Blazor.Buttons
@*Hidden:Lines*@
@inherits SampleBaseComponent
@inject NavigationManager NavigationManager




@*End:Hidden*@

<SampleDescription>
    <p>This sample demonstrates the keyboard interactions of the Button components. The various key combinations can be
        used to interact with Button components.</p>
</SampleDescription>
<ActionDescription>
    <i>The following keyboard shortcuts are used to initiate various actions.</i>
    <h5>Focus</h5>
    <ul>
        <li>
            <span class="key-class"><kbd>Alt</kbd> + <kbd>J</kbd></span>
            <span> - Focuses on the first component of the demo.</span>
        </li>
    </ul>

    <h5>Checkbox</h5>
    <ul>
        <li>
            <span class="key-class"><kbd>Space</kbd></span>
            <span> - When the checkbox has focus, pressing the Space key changes the
            state of the checkbox.</span>
        </li>
    </ul>
    <h5>Toggle Switch Button</h5>
    <ul>
        <li>
            <span class="key-class"><kbd>Space</kbd></span>
            <span> - When the switch has focus, pressing the Space key changes the state
            of the switch.</span>
        </li>
    </ul>
    <h5>Radio Button</h5>
    <ul>
        <li>
            <span class="key-class"><kbd>Arrow Keys</kbd></span>
            <span> - Activates next/previous radio in the Radio Button group.</span>
        </li>
    </ul>
    <h5>Button Group</h5>
    <h6>Single Selection</h6>
    <ul>
        <li>
            <span class="key-class"><kbd>Tab</kbd></span>
            <span> - Focuses the active button in the ButtonGroup.</span>
        </li>
        <li>
            <span class="key-class"><kbd>Arrow keys</kbd></span>
            <span> - Activates next/previous button in the ButtonGroup.</span>
        </li>
    </ul>
    <h6>Multiple Selection</h6>
    <ul>
        <li>
            <span class="key-class"><kbd>Tab</kbd></span>
            <span> - Focuses the next button in the ButtonGroup.</span>
        </li>
        <li>
            <span class="key-class"><kbd>Space</kbd></span>
            <span> - Activates the focused button in the ButtonGroup.</span>
        </li>
    </ul>
    <h5>Dropdown Menu & Split Button</h5>
    <ul>
        <li>
            <span class="key-class"><kbd>Esc</kbd></span>
            <span> - Closes the opened popup.</span>
        </li>
        <li>
            <span class="key-class"><kbd>Enter</kbd></span>
            <span> - Opens the popup, or activates the highlighted item and closes the
            popup.</span>
        </li>
        <li>
            <span class="key-class"><kbd>Space</kbd></span>
            <span> - Opens the popup.</span>
        </li>
        <li>
            <span class="key-class"><kbd>Up arrow</kbd></span>
            <span> - Navigates up or to the previous action item.</span>
        </li>
        <li>
            <span class="key-class"><kbd>Down arrow</kbd></span>
            <span> - Navigates down or to the next action item.</span>
        </li>
        <li>
            <span class="key-class"><kbd>Alt</kbd> + <kbd>Up arrow</kbd></span>
            <span> - Closes the popup.</span>
        </li>
        <li>
            <span class="key-class"><kbd>Alt</kbd> + <kbd>Down arrow</kbd></span>
            <span> - Opens the popup.</span>
        </li>
    </ul>
</ActionDescription>

<div class="control-section e-button-section">
    <div class="button-section">
        <div id="button-control">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                        <h5>Checkbox</h5>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                        <SfCheckBox @bind-Checked="isChecked"></SfCheckBox><br />
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                        <h5>Toggle Switch Button</h5>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                        <SfSwitch @bind-Checked="is_Checked"></SfSwitch>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                        <h5>Radio Button</h5>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                        <div style="display: inline-block; padding-right: 10px;">
                            <SfRadioButton Label="Credit Card" Name="payment" Value="credit" Checked="@checkedValue">
                            </SfRadioButton>
                        </div>
                        <div style="display: inline-block;">
                            <SfRadioButton Label="Debit Card" Name="payment" Value="debit" Checked="@checkedValue">
                            </SfRadioButton>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                        <h5>Button Group</h5>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                        <h5>Single Selection</h5>
                        <SfButtonGroup Mode="SelectionMode.Single">
                            <ButtonGroupButton>LEFT</ButtonGroupButton>
                            <ButtonGroupButton>CENTER</ButtonGroupButton>
                            <ButtonGroupButton>RIGHT</ButtonGroupButton>
                        </SfButtonGroup>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">

                    </div>
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                        <h5>Multiple Selection</h5>
                        <SfButtonGroup Mode="SelectionMode.Multiple">
                            <ButtonGroupButton>BOLD</ButtonGroupButton>
                            <ButtonGroupButton>ITALIC</ButtonGroupButton>
                            <ButtonGroupButton>UNDERLINE</ButtonGroupButton>
                        </SfButtonGroup>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                        <h5>Split Button</h5>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                        <SfSplitButton Content="Paste">
                            <DropDownMenuItems>
                                <DropDownMenuItem Text="Paste"></DropDownMenuItem>
                                <DropDownMenuItem Text="Paste Special"></DropDownMenuItem>
                                <DropDownMenuItem Text="Paste as Formula"></DropDownMenuItem>
                                <DropDownMenuItem Text="Paste as Hyperlink"></DropDownMenuItem>
                            </DropDownMenuItems>
                        </SfSplitButton>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                        <h5>Dropdown Menu</h5>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                        <SfDropDownButton Content="Profile">
                            <DropDownMenuItems>
                                <DropDownMenuItem Text="Dashboard"></DropDownMenuItem>
                                <DropDownMenuItem Text="Notifications"></DropDownMenuItem>
                                <DropDownMenuItem Text="User Settings"></DropDownMenuItem>
                                <DropDownMenuItem Text="Log Out"></DropDownMenuItem>
                            </DropDownMenuItems>
                        </SfDropDownButton>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

@code
{
    private bool isChecked = true;
    private bool is_Checked = true;
    private string checkedValue = "credit";
    
}

<style>
    #button-control {
        width: 170%;
        margin: 8% 0;
        text-align: left;
    }

    @@media only screen and (max-width: 500px) {
        #button-control {
            margin-left: -3%;
        }
    }

    .button-section {
        width: 80%;
        margin: auto;
    }

    #button-control .col-xs-12 {
        margin: 15px 0;
    }

    @@font-face {
        font-family: 'button-icons';
        src: url(data:application/x-font-ttf;charset=utf-8;base64,) format('truetype');
        font-weight: normal;
        font-style: normal;
    }

    .e-label {
        width: max-content !important;
    }

    .e-radio-wrapper {
        display: inline-block;
        line-height: 1;
        position: relative;
        margin-bottom: 20px;
    }

    .key-class {
        display: inline-block;
        width: 130px;
    }

    .e-button-section {
        padding-top: 0px !important;
    }
</style>
